snippet: The Film Society of Lincoln Center faces internal flux and competition in New York City. Industry figures and The Times’s chief film critics weigh in.
abstract: Several figures from film world offer suggestions for how Film Society of Lincoln Center, which is in state of flux with new executive director yet to be named, should proceed.
lead_paragraph: The Film Society of Lincoln Center faces internal flux and competition in New York City. Industry figures and The Times’s chief film critics weigh in.

headline.seo: Suggestions for Renewing the Film Society of Lincoln Center
